mapper.select: select lp_name from loan_product order by 1 desc

select lc.lc_num lc_num,lp.lp_name lp_name,lc.lc_state lc_state, m.mem_code mem_code,m.mem_name mem_name, nvl(lc.hd_code,0) hd_code,la.la_hamount la_hamount, la.la_startdate la_startdate, la.la_sysdate la_sysdate from loan_check lc, loan_application la, loan_product lp, member m where lc.lc_num=la.lc_num and lc.lp_num = lp.lp_num and lc.mem_code = m.mem_code
select lc_num from loan_check order by 1 desc

select lc.lc_num, m.mem_email,m.mem_name,m.mem_birth,la.la_hamount,TO_CHAR(la.la_sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') la_sysdate,lp.lp_name, TO_CHAR(la.la_sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') la_startdate, lc.lc_state, la.lr_type, la.la_livingterm, la.la_repayterm from loan_check lc, member m, loan_product lp,loan_application la where lc.lp_num = lp.lp_num and lc.lc_num = la.lc_num and lc.mem_code = m.mem_code and lc.lc_num =#{lc_num}
mapper.update: update loan_check set lc_state = #{lc_state} where lc_num = #{lc_num}
mapper.select: select lf_num, lc_num, lf_name,lf_oriname,to_char(lf_sysdate,'YY/MM/DD') lf_sysdate from loan_file where lc_num = #{lc_num}
